title: Marykeller
author: Marykeller
content: Day by day we keep learning a new thing from the internet. And our daily internet exposure they make us stumble upon things wey go be of help to us and go kukuma d make things d run smooth for us when we wan run a particular task in an easy way without much stress. With that reason I deemed it fit to bring it here make we get to know about Top Free Apps wey go help make your life betterQuote1. Grammarly—Write mistake-free.2. Calendly—Schedule meetings efficiently.3. Notion—All-in-one collaborative workspace.4. Loom—Record quick videos of screen and cam.5. Evernote - Once you start using Evernote, this note-taking app becomes a powerful tool for organizing just about everything. Notes can be anything—text, images, even audio 6. Pocket- Pocket Android app Pocket helps you catch up on your reading. 7. Google Translate - Google Translate is the go-to translation app available on any platform. It helps you translate language. 8.  Canva —Design Anything.9.  Make. com —Automate Anything.10. Quillbot —Paraphrase your writing.11. Buffer—Schedule your social media posts.12. Typeshare—Writing tool.13. Duolingo - Learn a new foreign language 14. Inshot - InShot is very intuitive to use and makes editing videos really easy and fun15. MyFitnessPal - MyFitnessPal should be your go-to app regarding your health and fitness progress monitoring. 16. Todoist - What was that thing you wanted to do today? With Todoist, you won't have to worry about having sticky notes all over. This app helps you arrange and plan your day. 17. Camscanner - CamScanner is probably the best document scanner app on mobile. You use the app to scan documents into your phone and convert them to PDF format.18. Last Password manager - LastPass Password Manager. You can store passwords and logins, create online shopping profiles, generate strong passwords, track personal information. Don’t forget your passwords anymore. 19. Wunderlist - An app that lets you create shareable lists of favorites—be they restaurants, sites in a city, or movies. 20.  Pinterest - Discover recipes, home ideas, style inspiration and other ideas to try.Get work done in minutes, not days!I hope this is helpful! #YorochiTvAll of the mentioned apps na free ooh. You can download them for your phones or laptops. You can add yours here If you get better app wey go be of help give us

comments.author: Abu-Naim
comments.body: Thank you for summarizing these apps and platforms or sites that make our work easier, because almost all of them are to support our writeups to make sure they look presentable and also to make learning and understanding easy for us.I don't know if the 18th one is advisable "Password manager" Is it advisable to trust a third party with our passwords especially the passwords to our important things like email, and exchanges or wallets?I think creating a unique password for ourselves will be better than given any third-party to manage our passwords to prevent hacks.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Well pretty cool post,  I am well familiar with most of the websites and app lited here as am a man who always surfs and try out new things in the internet. Staying updated is pretty much the best thing to do to yourself because you will be free from short reasoning because exposure makes your intellect to be wide open for more exploration.Canva is one of the apps which am well familiar with and I have also use it to design some cool stuff in the app.
